about_the_game:
MAKE THIS DREAM COUNT!

Dreamshot Fantasia is a tile-matching puzzle game that redefines tried and true color-matching action. With an authentic 80s anime aesthetic inspired by countless creators and an exotic electronic synth-based soundtrack, Dreamshot Fantasia honors the legacy of the past while carving out an identity of its own.

Shoot tiles onto the gamefield from the left and righthand sides in this new spin on the genre, and guide Judy through a neo-futuristic adventure to the Capitol City where she hopes to unlock the secrets of her precious pocketwatch. If you ever want to rest from that journey however, be sure to take a look at all the world of Luvenis has to offer:

  • Aim for the best score in Endless Mode
  • Challenge your friends in the competitive VS mode.
  • Sharpen your skills in Training mode.
  • Solve mind boggling puzzles in the traditional Puzzle Mode.
  • And of course, meet friends and foes on Judy's Journey in Story Mode.

Don't just stand there though, there's no time to waste! Feel the cool breeze of adventure, and find a way to a home all your own...
